subject: Basketball
lead_paragraph: Jamal Crawford, the first player the Knicks traded in their two-year salary purge, scored 21 points to lead the Atlanta Hawks to a victory, stopping the Knicks’ streak at five games.
snippet: Jamal Crawford, the first player the Knicks traded in their two-year salary purge, scored 21 points to lead the Atlanta Hawks to a victory, stopping the Knicks’ streak at five games.
